reports.label: No plausible inconsistencies or underspecified behaviors in Section 1
reports.explanation: Section 1’s high‐level description is consistent with RFC 9374 and RFC 9434 and does not present any actionable inconsistencies or ambiguities.
justification: The candidate issue explicitly notes that there are no plausible inconsistencies or underspecified behaviors detected in Section 1 (E1).
The sketch clarifies that Section 1 (Introduction, General Concept, Scope) is high-level and aligns with RFC 9374 and RFC 9434, supporting the absence of technical errors (E1).
